text: Zigmas Zinkevičius (January 4, 1925 in Juodausiai, Ukmergė district – February 20, 2018 in Vilnius) was a Lithuanian linguist-historian, professor at Vilnius University, and a full member of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences. He has contributed to studies in the history of languages, onomasticsŠvietimo informacijų technologijų centras. Zigmas Zinkevičius. Retrieved on 2008-08-18 Zinkevičius was a recipient of the Herder Prize, which was presented to him in 1994. Zinkevičius was the author of 30 academic books and several hundred scientific publications in various languages. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Lithuania Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Lithuanian people Category:Historians Category:Lithuanian educators
title: Zigmas Zinkevičius
